auth.trialDescription: You can try Quantos for free as long as you want.
auth.authenticateDescription: Or, set up an account to save your progress:
auth.groupAccessDescription: Part of a classroom or a team?

login.title: Welcome back!
login.error: An error has occurred during sign-in. Please check your details and try again! Reason:

groupaccess.instructions: Enter the code that you received
groupaccess.accountHint: You will receive a temporary, anonymous account without personal information. You can convert it into an actual account at any time after registration.
groupaccess.errorCodeNotFound: The access code you entered is not registered. Check your access card again or create your own account instead!
groupaccess.errorCodeNotActive: The access code you entered is invalid as this account has been deactivated. Please notify your instructor. If you believe you have received this message in error, please contact us at help@quantos.online.
groupaccess.errorCodeExpired: The access code you entered has expired. Check your access card again or create your own account instead!

welcomePage.title: Hi! Let's get started üöÄ
welcomePage.question: We'd like to ask you a few questions first to customize your user experience.

namePage.title: What's your name?
namePage.question: Leave this field blank if you don't want to be addressed by name.

accountTypePage.titleWithName: What type of account would you like to create, {{ userName }}?
accountTypePage.titleWithoutName: What type of account would you like to create?
accountTypePage.optionStudentDescription: Ideal for pupils, students and learning enthusiasts who want to find out more about quantum computing.
accountTypePage.optionTeacherDescription: Perfect for teachers and educators who supervise school classes, training courses or workshops. Enables the creation and management of access codes for participants.

agePage.title: How old are you?
agePage.question: This question is optional, but improves your learning experience.

experiencePage.title: How would you describe yourself?
experiencePage.question: That is, how familiar are you with quantum computing in general?

finishPanel.finishLessonText: Well done! Click here to complete:
finishPanel.ratingQuestion: How would you rate this lesson?

stats.heading: Statistics
stats.activityDataNote: Usage data older than 30 days is deleted automatically (except for progress tracking).

totalProgress.title: Overall progress
totalProgress.description: Way to go! So far, you've completed:

activity.title: Activity
activity.description: online time in the last 30 days

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: completed lessons in the last 7 days

code.heading: Coding
code.headerText: Ready to take matters in your own hands? Send your Hamilton matrices to our simulator or a real-life DWave quantum annealer and use the results to solve problems nobody ever attempted before!

apiTokenField.label: Your API token
apiTokenField.instruction: This is required to authenticate your requests to the quantum annealer.

hamiltonianMatrixField.label: Hamiltonian matrix
hamiltonianMatrixField.instruction: Enter a square upper triangular matrix with the coefficients of your optimization problem.
hamiltonianMatrixField.error: Must be a valid Hamilton matrix (square, zeros under the main diagonal, JSON format).

consoleOutput.successSimulator: Operation successful! Here are the top solutions (up to 5), sorted from best to worst energy:
consoleOutput.successAnnealer: Operation successful! Here are the top solutions (up to 10), retreived from 1000 measurements, sorted from best to worst energy:
consoleOutput.failure: Something went wrong - unable to fetch response. If you're using DWave Advantage mode, check your internet connection, or try again.

code.probabilityDescription: This simulates how likely you would get each result on a real quantum annealer, from best to worst. At this temparature of the QPU, the best solution to your problem has a {{ percentage }} chance to be found.

convertAnonymous.title: Convert anonymous sign-in to permanent account
convertAnonymous.description: You have registered with an access code that remains valid for 30 days. If you want to use Quantos for longer and maintain your progress, you can convert your account to a permanent one.

error.unknownErrorDialogText: Oops! It seems that something went wrong... Please notify your instructor and try again later. If the problem persists, please contact us at help@quantos.online.
